title: Get Orin's Netherstone
content:
(Drow Bhaalspawn, boss of BG2:TOB ), Echo of Illasera (Bhaalspawn, boss of BG2:TOB) and the Echo of Amelyssan (final boss of BG2:TOB). Either prove to them you are a holy assassin of Bhaal by killing hollyphant investigator, Valeria. (And Minsc and Jaheira if they are with you.) Or defeat Sarevok (Lv 16 fighter).

Lae'zel Gale Halsin Minthara Yenna

With Amulet of Bhaal, open the gate to Bhaal's Temple (east to Undercity Ruins). You must defeat mutiple Bhaalist before reaching the temple proper.
